thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very bad
thread.title_full: Very bad - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sergio B
title: Very bad
text: There are so many hotels in London and in Westminster area that you don't have to book this hotel. Very bad experience. Rooms are tiny but that is not the issue. Staff is horrible. They charge to keep your bags. They charge if you arrive 15 minutes before 3PM. Shower drains do not work and shower are become a dirty water pool. I killed a spider in room. Corridors are a mess because they have to store their operational stuff there. No daily cleaning of the room. That is why I suggest you to look for another option. There are many other hotels in this area.
